summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3723 , for the improvement of East 65th Street (south side) from a point approximately 48 feet west of the west margin of 30th Avenue Northeast to the east margin of 35th Avenue Northeast; by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 45698 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
